trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.

Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded" /> event, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted" /> event, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed" /> event, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved" /> event, or <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanged" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 表示將處理 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded" /> 物件之 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted" /> 事件、<see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed" /> 事件、<see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved" /> 事件、<see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanged" /> 事件或 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventHandler> delegate will be called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded> event, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted> event, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed> event, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved> event, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventHandler>委派時將會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded>事件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted>事件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed>事件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>事件，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanged>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Page developers can provide custom handlers for Web Parts events by adding an `OnWebPartAdded` attribute, `OnWebPartDeleted` attribute, `OnWebPartClosed` attribute, `OnWebPartMoved` attribute, or `OnSelectedWebPartChanged` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 網頁開發人員可以提供的自訂處理常式 Web 組件事件加`OnWebPartAdded`屬性，`OnWebPartDeleted`屬性`OnWebPartClosed`屬性`OnWebPartMoved`屬性，或`OnSelectedWebPartChanged`屬性`<asp:webpartmanager>`元素在頁面中，指定給該屬性的自訂方法名稱。

trans-unit.source: A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 自訂處理常式也可以指派以程式設計的方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關以程式設計的方式指派的事件處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 如何： 連接事件處理常式方法的事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc)。
